desc: Modern Restoratives CBD products are made from an extract of hemp, a type of cannabis plant that contains significantly higher CBD content (up to 40%) and negligible amounts of THC (around 0.3%) compared to cannabis plants that are cultivated for their high THC content. In fact, CBD acts as a natural adversary to THC.

layout.text:
We invite you to share in our discovery of true wellness.
A better you awaits with Modern Restoratives.
